mapper.insert:
select shop_no_seq.nextval from dual
insert into shop(shop_no,shop_categori,shop_name,shop_image,shop_explain, shop_minprice,shop_opentime,shop_closetime,shop_tel,shop_origin,address,addressdetail,postcode, shop_accountname,shop_account,shop_license,ceo_no) values(#{shopNo},#{shopCategori},#{shopName},#{shopImage},#{shopExplain},#{shopMinprice},#{shopOpentime} ,#{shopClosetime},#{shopTel},#{shopOrigin},#{address},#{addressDetail},#{postcode},#{shopAccountname} ,#{shopAccount},#{shopLicense},#{ceoNo})
